content.description: "THE Mile 45 boulder is on the "East" side of the road (i.e. the right side as you head towards Mt Willard and Bretton Woods)A 100 or so feet further "North" of the Mile 45 boulder (towards Mt Willard) but on the left side of the road is a group of 3 or 4 boulders. None looked climbed on. All need some cleaning, and the biggest one probably could use the broken and dead tree cut off its top if there are some routes on it.For now, just photos perhaps to entice someone to take a look and "report back"
